title: Breathtaking views and incredible amenities! 3 bed 2 bath 1300 sqft
posting_body: ['RENTAL INFO', 'Rental Rates:', '$1901/month', 'Location:', '1 Seasons Pkwy Norcross, GA 30093', 'Unit for Rent:', '3-BR 2-BA |', 'Square Feet:', '1300 sq ft |', 'Lease Length:', '6-Month, 10-Month, 11-Month, 12-Month, 13-Month', 'show contact info', 'PROPERTY AMENITIES', '✓ Business Center', '✓ Fitness Center with Cardio Screens', '✓ Full Size Washer Dryer Connections', '✓ Gated Community', '✓ Picnic Area', '✓ Playground', '✓ Smoke Free', '✓ Sparkling Pool', '✓ Tennis Court', '✓ Great Location', '✓ Online Services', '✓ Pets Allowed', '✓ Preferred Employer Discounts Available', '✓ Resident Social Events', '✓ Screened In Patios', '✓ Serene Views', 'APARTMENT AMENITIES', '✓ Carpet', '✓ Dishwasher', '✓ Disposal/Trash Compactor', '✓ Eat-in Kitchen', '✓ High Speed Internet Access', '✓ Oven', '✓ Patios or Balconies', '✓ Range', '✓ Refrigerator/Freezer', '✓ Tub/Shower', '✓ Custom Lighting', '✓ Designer Touches', '✓ Fireplaces in Select Apartment Homes', '✓ Full Size Washer Dryer Connections', '✓ Hardwood Floors', '✓ Premier Upgrade Unit', '✓ Spacious Layouts', '✓ Storage Units', '✓ Total Electric', '✓ Walk-In Closets', 'ADDITIONAL INFO', 'Description:', "There's plenty of shopping, dining, outdoor activities and more near Las Palmas Apartments.", "You'll love living in the Norcross location!", 'Pet Policy:', 'A maximum of 2 pet per unit shall be accepted.', 'The pet fee is $300 Non-Refundable per pet.', 'A pet addendum must be completed and pet fees must be paid prior to moving in.', 'If there is more than one pet per unit, the combined weight of the 2 pets cannot exceed 50lbs.', 'Website:', '<URL>/', 'Las Palmas Apartments:', 'show contact info', 'Admin Fee of 135 due upon application processing non refundable..', 'EQUAL HOUSING OPPORTUNITY', '89D6CD23349640F6']
